data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Taft, William H., Cognato, Anthony I. (2017): Recognition of a new species of Carmenta from New Mexico supported by morphology and mitochondrial cytochrome oxidase I data (Lepidoptera: Sesiidae: Sesiinae: Synanthedonini). Zootaxa 4337 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.3.8|3 occurrences
